content:
IChangeTracking Interface

Definition

Defines the mechanism for querying the object for changes and resetting of the changed status.

In this Article

public interface IChangeTracking

Properties

IsChanged

Gets the object's changed status.

public bool IsChanged { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the object’s content has changed since the last call to stem.ComponentModel.IChangeTracking.AcceptChanges*; otherwise, false.

Methods

AcceptChanges()

Resets the object’s state to unchanged by accepting the modifications.

public void AcceptChanges ();
